images.usage: Showcase the tropical paradise of Thailand and attract attention to the promotional offer.
Illustrate the benefits of traveling during the less crowded season.

images.alt_text: topless man sitting on cliff rock viewing Ko Nang Yuan isalnd, houses, and buildings under white and yellow sky

external_metadata.reasoning: Real Unsplash image for: Capturing the essence of a tropical getaway, showcasing beautiful beaches and vibrant landscapes.

images.alt_text: green trees and mountains under cloudy sky during daytime

external_metadata.reasoning: Real Unsplash image for: Illustrating calm and tranquil scenes of Thailand to emphasize the benefits of traveling during the less crowded summer months.

images.alt_text: green leafed trees and body of water

external_metadata.reasoning: Real Unsplash image for: Highlighting the adventurous spirit and exotic nature of Thailand, appealing to travel enthusiasts.
Real Unsplash image for: Focusing on the summer travel aspect, promoting the allure of Thailand as a summer destination.

images.alt_text: brown wooden boat on beach shore during daytime

external_metadata.reasoning: Real Unsplash image for: Visuals that represent special offers and deals for traveling to Thailand, suitable for promotional content.

icons.usage: Indicate special offers and discounts for flights and facilitate easy booking process for users.
Indicate special offers and discounts for flights and facilitate easy booking process for users.

assetRequirements.purpose: Showcase the beauty and allure of Thailand's tropical beaches and exotic landscapes.
assetRequirements.content_context: Highlighting the tropical exoticism and appeal of Thailand as a summer vacation destination.

assetRequirements.purpose: Illustrate the unique aspects of traveling to Thailand during the summer season, such as fewer tourists and lower prices.
assetRequirements.content_context: Emphasizing the tranquility and special atmosphere of traveling during the off-peak season.

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в рай: Перелеты в Таиланд по лучшим ценам!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected hero". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
